price: «Мени волидамга меҳрибон қилди ва мени ситамкор, бадбахт қилмади».
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
